metadata.name: PERFECT IMPERFECTION
metadata.description:
"Perfect Imperfection"  
This is a piece that explores the balance between flawlessness and imperfection. 
At first glance, the artwork exudes a sense of sleek and polished precision. The clean lines and intricate details showcase a meticulous attention to detail, reflecting a quest for perfection.  
However, upon closer examination, you'll notice intentional distortions incorporated into the artwork. These subtle imperfections disrupt the perfection. 
This is my first ever NFT on manifold, so this is very special. This is a very special piece to me aswell, hope every1 enjoys :3
